title: Tressym
contents: property | Speed | 40 ft., fly 40 ft., climb 30 ft.
property | Senses | darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 15
property | Languages | understands Common but can't speak
description | Detect Invisibility | Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.
description | Keen Smell | The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
description | Poison Sense | A tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.
description | Claws | Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.
